name: BreakOut (itch) (Animaster1248)
description:
A simple, yet complex rage inducing 3D maze game. How fast can you complete the entire maze? 

This is a test run of ideas for a bigger project I will be working on in the horror genre. As a wise man used to say, 'Dream Big!'. With my skills in a lot of software to back me up, I'm looking forward to create something everyone would enjoy!
